Administration.text:
Type:
Tricyclic antidepressant
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: oral
Common Trade Names: Aventyl, Pamelor

Pediatric_Dosing.text: Adolescents: 30-50mg daily in single or divided doses

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C
Lactation risk
: Infant risk minimal
Renal dosing: no adjustment
Hepatic dosing

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Use of MAOI currently or in past 14 days
Recent MI
Concomitant use with linezolid or methylene blue

Serious.text:
Heart block, prolonged QT, dysrhythmia, MI, sudden cardiac death
SIADH
Bone marrow depression
Fulminant hepatic failure
Stroke
Myoclonus, seizure
Worsening depression, suicidality, mania, psychosis
Angioedema
